text_block_list.text: It's the second day of the training camp. We're supposed to get down to business today, but… ever since that mock race, I haven't been able to hold a proper conversation with Espoir City.
choice_data_list: (Will she actually show up to training…?)

text_block_list.text: My first impression of her is that she's ill-tempered, disobedient, and doesn't listen to a single word. She's clearly going through a rebellious phase. I wonder if she's going to skip out…

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Huuuh?!

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: The hell's up with that look… what, you think I'm weak?! This a damn joke to you?!
It looks like she's not as much of a slacker as I'd thought. In between apologizing repeatedly, I explain our training schedule to her.
choice_data_list: Alright, let's begin with a light warm-up!

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: C'mon, c'mon, c'mon, c'mon!
choice_data_list: Hold on! You're going way too fast!

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Put a sock in it! The fastest one wins, don't they?!
choice_data_list: But this is a warm-up! A warm-up!

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text:
Huff… puff… guh… so? What's next? 
Y'want me to win in a partner run or somethin' next, that it?!
I bite my lip in thought as I stare at Espoir City gasping for breath. She's already tired herself out, so it'll be hard to run splits or do any other heavy exercise. So that means…
choice_data_list: Okay… let's look back on yesterday!

text_block_list.text: Thanks to yesterday's race, I know what the issue is now. Her lack of acceleration means that if she holds herself back, it'll backfire in the final stretch.
choice_data_list: We don't want to lose again, so what we're—

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Lose… again?

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text:
What, so you think I'm some weak-ass 
Umamusume you gotta coddle like a baby?

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: I AIN'T GONNA DO IT!

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text:
First of all, I ain't weak! And I ain't some pushover! 
So quit spoutin' bullshit at me!

…I completely and utterly failed. 
After that, she refused to do any sort of training at all.
choice_data_list: Time to regroup for the afternoon…

text_block_list.text:
I try and ponder what to do with Espoir City 
while eating my lunch at the racecourse dining hall.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Oh, if it isn't Espoir City. 
Looking for somewhere to sit?

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text:
How about you eat with us? Look, we have a seat open, see? 
It's better to eat with others than alone.

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text:
…W-Who the hell'd wanna eat with you guys?! 
Just… stop lookin' at me like that!

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text:
You all are the ones gettin' antsy without anyone to cling to! 
I'm not some kinda crybaby, got it?!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text: Looks like we got turned down. I thought it'd be a nice chance to talk to her without the facade, too…
I watch Espoir City's retreating back, and drift into thought again. Why is she…
Espoir City puts up the tough girl act no matter who she's talking to. But as a trainer, it feels wrong to leave her alone.
I leave the dining hall and search the corridors for any trace of the Umamusume in question. After looking far and wide…

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Om… nom…
Espoir City is sitting in the empty racecourse stands, eating her lunch. …All by herself.
(music)

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text:
Alright, alright, I'm picking up! 
Just hold on! Okay.

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Whaddya want… Mom.

I begin to feel awkward, so I quickly hide. 
Thankfully, it looks like she hasn't noticed me.

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text:
Have I eaten? Yeah, I am right now. 
…Huh? You wanna know about my trainer for the camp?

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text:
Who gives a damn?! I told you to quit 
fussin' over me like that already.

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text:
Forget all that. Why're you callin' me? 
Don't tell me you hurt yourself again and had to go to the hos—

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text:
"You were free, so you wanted to call"? 
…What? What?!

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: No, no! Don't hang up! I told you it's fine! You're so annoying! You got me all wrong.

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: I can handle myself, okay?! I ain't a little kid! It's fine, okay? Doesn't matter if you're sad or just bored. You can spill it all to me.

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: Cuz after all—I'm a strong girl, yeah?!
I'm not sure if it was meant more for her mother or for herself, but Espoir City called herself a "strong girl" on that phone conversation.

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text:
First of all, I ain't weak! And I ain't some pushover! 
So quit spoutin' bullshit at me!

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: You all are the ones gettin' antsy without anyone to cling to! I'm not some kinda crybaby, got it?!
She often denies being weak, as if rebelling against some trainer who's already decided she is.
(Snap!)

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text:
Hey! 
The hell you think you're doin'?!
